summary: Prague is the capital of the Czech Republic, with a population of around 1.4 million. It's known for its rich history and beautiful architecture, dating back to the Roman era. The city has been an important political and cultural center, especially during the Bohemian and Protestant Reformations. Prague Castle, Charles Bridge, and the Old Town Square are famous landmarks. The city's historic center is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Prague also boasts many museums, theaters, and a top-ranked university. It's a popular tourist destination, attracting millions each year.
title: Prague
